SEARCH
Package com.bcb.vetra.daos

Class RequestDao

java.lang.Object
com.bcb.vetra.daos.RequestDao
@Component public class RequestDao extends Object
Data Access Object for requests.

This class is responsible for all database operations related to requests.

Models: Request, RequestWithPrescription(view model)
